alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 1:06AM AKST until December 21 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches over higher terrain and ice accumulations of up to 0.2 inches. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for significant reductions in visibility at times. Winds gusting to 35 mph on summits. Visibility may be reduced to one half mile or less at times in blowing snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
